revised_title: Kinetics of Polysulphone Formation: 1-Butene Polysulphone at 25°C
tldr: The authors investigated the formation of 1-butene polysulphone from mixtures of liquid sulfur dioxide and 1-butene at 25°C. They studied the reaction kinetics, initiator effects, and the influence of reactant concentrations. The results showed that the reaction rate was proportional to the amount of residual 1-butene and that the polymerization process was similar to other normal radical polymerization reactions.
